_A_JSON_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: AJson is a Vue.js component designed for displaying and editing JSON data. It includes a text area for JSON input, buttons for formatting, resetting, and discarding changes, and an area for displaying the current JSON value.
_A_JSON_PROPS_HEIGHT_CSS_DESCRIPTION_: Sets the height of the component via CSS. Accepts a string with the height value, e.g., 400px;.
